00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "XYRectangle.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00036 #include "MsqVertex.hpp"
00037 
00038 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00039 
00040 
00041 XYRectangle::XYRectangle( double w, double h, double x, double y, double z, Plane p )
00042   : normalDir(p),
00043     widthDir((p+1)%3),
00044     heightDir((p+2)%3)
00045 {
00046   minCoords[0] = maxCoords[0] = x;
00047   minCoords[1] = maxCoords[1] = y;
00048   minCoords[2] = maxCoords[2] = z;
00049   maxCoords[widthDir] += w;
00050   maxCoords[heightDir] += h;
00051 }
00052 
00053 void XYRectangle::setup( Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00054 {
00055   const double epsilon = 1e-4;
00056   if (maxCoords[widthDir] - minCoords[widthDir] <= epsilon || 
00057       maxCoords[heightDir] - minCoords[heightDir] <= epsilon ||
00058       maxCoords[normalDir] - minCoords[normalDir] > epsilon) {
00059     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid rectangle dimensions", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00060     return;
00061   }
00062   
00063   mConstraints.clear();
00064   
00065   std::vector<Mesh::EntityHandle> vertices;
00066   mesh->get_all_vertices( vertices, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00067   if (vertices.empty()) {
00068     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Empty mesh", MsqError::INVALID_MESH );
00069     return;
00070   }
00071   
00072   std::vector<MsqVertex> coords(vertices.size());
00073   mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( arrptr(vertices), arrptr(coords), coords.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00074   
00075   for (size_t i = 0; i < vertices.size(); ++i) {
00076     for (int d = 0; d < 3; ++d) {
00077       if (d == normalDir)
00078         continue;
00079       if (minCoords[d] - coords[i][d] > epsilon || 
00080           coords[i][d] - maxCoords[d] > epsilon) {
00081         MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_MESH,
00082                         "Invalid vertex coordinate: (%f,%f,%f)\n",
00083                         coords[i][0],coords[i][1],coords[i][2]);
00084         return;
00085       }
00086       else if (coords[i][d] - minCoords[d] < epsilon) {
00087         VertexConstraint c( d, minCoords[d] );
00088         mConstraints.insert( constraint_t::value_type( vertices[i], c ) );
00089       }
00090       else if (maxCoords[d] - coords[i][d] < epsilon) {
00091         VertexConstraint c( d, maxCoords[d] );
00092         mConstraints.insert( constraint_t::value_type( vertices[i], c ) );
00093       }
00094     }
00095   }
00096 }
00097 
00098 void XYRectangle::snap_to( Mesh::VertexHandle vertex,
00099                            Vector3D &coordinate ) const
00100 {
00101     // everything gets moved into the plane
00102   coordinate[normalDir] = minCoords[normalDir];
00103     // apply other constraints
00104   constraint_t::const_iterator i = mConstraints.lower_bound( vertex );
00105   for (; i != mConstraints.end() && i->first == vertex; ++i)
00106     coordinate[i->second.axis] = i->second.coord;
00107 }
00108   
00109 void XYRectangle::vertex_normal_at( Mesh::VertexHandle handle, Vector3D &norm ) const
00110 {
00111   norm.set(0,0,0);
00112   norm[normalDir] = 1.0;
00113 }
00114   
00115 void XYRectangle::element_normal_at( Mesh::ElementHandle handle, Vector3D &norm ) const
00116 {
00117   norm.set(0,0,0);
00118   norm[normalDir] = 1.0;
00119 }
00120 
00121 void XYRectangle::vertex_normal_at( const Mesh::VertexHandle* vertices,
00122                                     Vector3D normals[],
00123                                     unsigned count,
00124                                     MsqError&  ) const
00125 {
00126   Vector3D norm(0,0,0);
00127   norm[normalDir] = 1.0;
00128   std::fill( normals, normals+count, norm );
00129 }
00130     
00131 void XYRectangle::closest_point( Mesh::VertexHandle vertex,
00132                                  const Vector3D& position,
00133                                  Vector3D& closest,
00134                                  Vector3D& normal,
00135                                  MsqError&  ) const
00136 {
00137   normal = position;
00138   vertex_normal_at( vertex, normal );
00139   closest = position;
00140   closest[2] = 0;
00141 }
00142     
00143 void XYRectangle::domain_DoF( const Mesh::VertexHandle* vertices,
00144                               unsigned short* dof_array,
00145                               size_t num_handles,
00146                               MsqError&  ) const
00147 {
00148   for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_handles; ++i) {
00149       // everything is at least constrained to XY-plane
00150     dof_array[i] = 2;
00151       // each additional constraint reduces degrees of freedom
00152     constraint_t::const_iterator j = mConstraints.lower_bound( vertices[i] );
00153     for (; j != mConstraints.end() && j->first == vertices[i]; ++j)
00154       --dof_array[i];
00155   }
00156 }
